text: Richard Benjamin Harrison Jr. (also known by the nicknames The Old Man and The Appraiser; March 4, 1941 â€“ June 25, 2018) was an American businessman and reality television personality. He was born in Danville, Virginia, but raised in Lexington, North Carolina. He was best known as the co-owner of the World Famous Gold & Silver Pawn Shop, as featured on the History channel series Pawn Stars. Harrison was usually referred to by his nickname, "The Old Man".Meet the Pawn Stars: The Old Man "The Appraiser" . History. Retrieved February 10, 2011.
